header.title: Users
header.description: Manage your users and their roles.

ban.description: Ban this user from the platform. You can specify a reason and an optional expiration date for the ban.

reason.info: Enter the reason for banning the user.

You are about to delete this user.

Do you want to continue?

update.description: Make sure to choose a strong password that meets the security requirements. This action will immediately update the user's login credentials.
update.info: Enter the new password for the account.
